AltText.MapTitle: Map showing the location of Le Calme

LeCalme.Title: Le Calme
LeCalme.Subtitle: Guest room in Plessé
LeCalme.Presentation: Nestled in the heart of the Carheil estate in Plessé, Le Calme is a guest room designed for lovers of nature, tranquility, and authenticity. Surrounded by lakes, forests, and country trails, it offers a peaceful haven perfect for both rest and exploration. Just an hour from Nantes or the Atlantic coast, our home is the ideal starting point for discovering the region: hiking, cycling, local markets, or canoeing on the Nantes-Brest canal... Here, everything invites you to slow down and breathe.
LeCalme.Menu:
Here, we take care of you—even at the table!
If you'd like to enjoy a meal on-site, that's absolutely possible. Whether a simple dinner or a more elaborate menu, we’ll prepare what suits your taste. Just let us know your wishes in advance, and we’ll take care of the rest so you can simply enjoy the moment.

Booking.Title: Booking
Booking.Description: You can call us directly to book for 80€, or go through our partner

Location.Address: To come to us : 1 Av. de la Vall. Dom. Carheil, 44630 Plessé

Distance.Nantes: Nantes: about 45 km southwest of Plessé, or about 40 minutes by car.
Distance.Rennes: Rennes: about 120 km northwest of Plessé, or about 1.5 hours by car.
Distance.SaintNazaire: Saint-Nazaire: about 55 km west of Plessé, or about 45 minutes by car.
Distance.Vannes: Vannes: about 115 km north of Plessé, or about 1.5 hours by car.

Location.Title: Find us

NatureWalks.Title: Walks on the estate
NatureWalks.Description: Wander the peaceful trails around the Carheil estate.

LakeRecreation.Title: Buhel leisure center
LakeRecreation.Description: Canoeing, treetop adventures, paddleboarding... just 10 minutes away.

LocalCulture.Title: Culture & Heritage
LocalCulture.Description: Discover Plessé, its artisans, and its castles.
